keys.string: Start
Hi Ryn, I’ve got a question about this homework.
[None]Deep Learning
Hm? I’m not too good at that class. Maybe you should ask someone else.
a
[None]Cloud Computing
[None]VR
Alright. Hit me.
Hit you?
It’s an expression, just ask the question.
I’m wondering how to set up this UI so that it would be the most efficient while still being aesthetically pleasing.
Ah, a design question. I like it. Well do you have a sketch for the layout you were considering?
I pull out my notebook and produce a drawing from class.
Well you already have all the elements that you need here. You just need to work on their placement. Why don’t we try moving some stuff around.
I spend couple of minutes making a new sketch.
How about this design then?
This one is perfect! I like your use of negative space.

Ryn is making a critique of my work, but I’m looking at the plant on his windowsill. It’s a cactus. Hmm... didn’t one of the teachers say he likes gardening? But you’d never put a cactus in a garden anyway.
Thanks for all your help. Also was wondering if I could have your cactus.
My what!?
... I mean … I didn’t know you were also gay-
No. The one on your windowsill. The literal plant.
Ah yes, you could have never meant anything else...
I have a few others at home, so I guess you could have it.
Are you worthy of such great responsibility? You have to water it once a week ya know.
Of course I’m ready.
Always ready for a good cactus huh? ;) You’re going to have to convince me.
Since when have cacti been so suggestive?
Alright. How?
Through the power of gameplay!
Ok, you can have my cactus. His name his Kevin. If he dies, I’ll find you.
Wait, what are you using this for anyway?
I have something really important to do right now.
b

ArrayOfString.string: [Player][Dialog]Hi Ryn, I’ve got a question about this homework.
[Ryn][Option]What class is it in?
[None]Deep Learning
[None]Cloud Computing
[None]VR
[Ryn][Dialog]Hm? I’m not too good at that class. Maybe you should ask someone else.
[Narrator][End]a
Dog
[Ryn][Dialog]Hm? I’m not too good at that class. Maybe you should ask someone else.
[Ryn][Dialog]Alright. Hit me.
[Player][Dialog]Hit you?
[Ryn][Dialog]It’s an expression, just ask the question.
[Player][Dialog]I’m wondering how to set up this UI so that it would be the most efficient while still being aesthetically pleasing.
[Ryn][Dialog]Ah, a design question. I like it. Well do you have a sketch for the layout you were considering?
[Narrator][Dialog]I pull out my notebook and produce a drawing from class.
[Ryn][Dialog]Well you already have all the elements that you need here. You just need to work on their placement. Why don’t we try moving some stuff around.
[Narrator][Dialog]I spend couple of minutes making a new sketch.
[Player][Dialog]How about this design then?
[Ryn][Dialog]This one is perfect! I like your use of negative space.

[Narrator][Dialog]Ryn is making a critique of my work, but I’m looking at the plant on his windowsill. It’s a cactus. Hmm... didn’t one of the teachers say he likes gardening? But you’d never put a cactus in a garden anyway.
[Player][Dialog]Thanks for all your help. Also was wondering if I could have your cactus.
[Ryn][Dialog]My what!?
[Ryn][Dialog]... I mean … I didn’t know you were also gay-
[Player][Dialog]No. The one on your windowsill. The literal plant.
[Ryn][Dialog]Ah yes, you could have never meant anything else...
[Ryn][Dialog]I have a few others at home, so I guess you could have it.
[Ryn][Dialog]Are you worthy of such great responsibility? You have to water it once a week ya know.
[Player][Dialog]Of course I’m ready.
[Ryn][Dialog]Always ready for a good cactus huh? ;) You’re going to have to convince me.
[Narrator][Dialog]Since when have cacti been so suggestive?
[Player][Dialog]Alright. How?
[Ryn][Dialog]Through the power of gameplay!
[Ryn][Dialog]Ok, you can have my cactus. His name his Kevin. If he dies, I’ll find you.
[Ryn][Dialog]Wait, what are you using this for anyway?
[Player][Dialog]I have something really important to do right now.
[Narrator][Scene]PuzzleTest
